summary:
A career in public accounting has brought me the opportunity of an international professional and private life. Working with multicultural teams, international clients, and third party service providers at varying locations exposed me to situations that were ever changing, challenging and exciting, making me adaptable and flexible; adopting a chameleon mentality! All the while consistently applying my values of professionalism, integrity, dependability and honesty.

Seeking to bring my values, skills and experiences to volunteer work opportunities has been an integral part of my life and has given me the possibility to remain connected, gain varying work experiences while making a contribution to the community.

The varying skills, professional and volunteer work experiences, obtained over the years have proven to be highly transferable; most recently into the foreign diplomatic sector in a supporting role as an administrative and financial assistant at the Embassy of the Republic of Panama to the Kingdom of The Netherlands. Having the opportunity to serve my native country in this capacity has been personally fulfilling and a great learning opportunity.

	2008 – 2018, Women's Ministry Leader, assisting with weekly bible study sessions, organize social events and volunteer service opportunities. 

Events organized include:

•	Provided for the catering needs of 80 volunteers and the Roma Gypsies living at the campsite, during a weeklong mission trip to Cluj-Napoca, Romania to build homes for the Roma Gypsies.

•	American Women’s Club of Brussels, engaged in social and philanthropic work
        2003, Treasurer, responsible for the finance function, member of the board of directors overseeing the operations, improved the accounting, recordkeeping and monthly financial reporting processes.", 'title': 'Leadership roles through volunteer experience', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Freelance', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Freelance', 'description': "Applying my organizational, managerial and supervisory skills to my passion for hospitality as a freelance events planner for private individuals and various organizations; including religious organizations, embassy and non-profit women's organizations.

Ensuring accurate, compliant and timely reporting.', 'title': 'Financial Reporting Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1044, 'name': 'PwC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGv_22548SaOQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1689197046877?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ExPap1fji47kUzWW6Ci2VT3UwRDJfap4xCJPT4J8ZOc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pwc/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 1987}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'New York City, Curacao, Jersey Channel Islands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 1987}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}}, 'company': 'PwC', 'description': 'I began my career in the New York City office, and progressively continued my career growth specializing in the offshore investment company sector, with postings in various offshore locations; New York City, Curacao and Jersey, The Channel Islands. This experience gave me the opportunity of working with an international client base and leading multi-cultural audit teams. 

My client portfolio consisted primarily of mutual funds investing in diverse financial instruments and derivatives, finance companies and private trust funds administered by third party trust administrators.

During 1995 - 1996, I became the office manager and local representative in Curaçao responsible for the audit and office administrative operations. In this role, in addition to managing audit engagements, I gained the experience of being responsible for the supervision of administrative personnel, the financial results for the office operating activities, and representing PWC in the local community.', 'title': 'Progressive growth from Audit staff to manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}]
